name: dexify
description: A Spotify-style desktop music client using Deezer and Deemix
author: Daniel Apathy

scripts.build:vendor:deezer-sdk: tsup deemix-main/packages/deezer-sdk/src/index.ts --format esm --platform node --out-dir deemix-main/packages/deezer-sdk/dist --clean --tsconfig tsconfig.vendor.json && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('deemix-main/packages/deezer-sdk/dist/index.js','export * from \"./index.mjs\";\n')"
scripts.build:vendor:deemix-lite: tsup vendor/deemix-lite-entry.ts --format esm --platform node --out-dir vendor/dist --clean --tsconfig tsconfig.vendor.json
scripts.build:vendor: npm run build:vendor:deezer-sdk && npm run build:vendor:deemix-lite
scripts.start: npm run build:vendor && env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE electron .
